description.narrative: We have signed a Cooperative Agreement with USAID as a Prime. PathFinder International are the Sub grantee ($6M). We expect to send out grants of around $14M to implementing partners, yet to be identified. Some of these partners will be adopted from the previous OVC Programme managed by Amref.

participating-org.narrative: Faroe Islands Ministry of Foreign Affairs
United States Agency for International Development (USAID)

mailing-address.narrative: Christian Aid, 35-41 Lower Marsh, London SE1 7RL, United Kingdom

description.narrative: Internal allocation from income source to partner project
